com.example.decisiondice

Class OOCSIHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.decisiondice.OOCSIHandler

  • public class OOCSIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the OOCSI listener setup and the OOCSI handler method. It handles incoming OOCSI events.
    Author:
    Marcin van de Ven, Dianne Vasseur, Manon Blankendaal, Anne Kok
